summary: Mapped the semantic completeness architecture and compared mathematical rigor of two approaches. The semantic approach (semantic_weak_completeness) is mathematically superior because truth IS MCS membership definitionally, aligning with standard modal logic completeness proofs. Recommended adopting this as the canonical completeness result and documented priority order for filling remaining sorries.

artifacts.summary: Follow-up research analyzing semantic approach organization, mathematical correctness comparison, and recommendations for highest quality metalogic results
